p.strong: CONTACT US AT FPSQUESTIONS@FITCHBURG.K12.MA.US WITH ANY QUESTIONS OR CONCERNS.

div.p: No meal distribution on Monday, April 20, due to the Patriots Day holiday. Families will be able to pick up additional meals on Friday, April 17.
Actualizacin de distribucin de comidas FPS
No habr distribucin de comidas el lunes 20 de abril, debido a las vacaciones del Da de los Patriotas. Las familias podrn recoger comidas adicionales el viernes 17 de abril.

div.small: This is Superintendent of Schools, Robert Jokela. You will receive an email from your childs school principal who will be sharing the Commonwealths Commissioner of Education, Jeff Rileys letter to parents about how schools will be operating during the Covid-19 crisis. The letter addresses the Department of Educations remote learning recommendations, as well as updates on a range of other matters related to the school closures. I understand this is a challenging time for you and your family and we want to keep your child engaged for their eventual return to school, currently scheduled for May 4, 2020.

Estos es en parte del superintendente Robert Jokela. Recibir un correo electrnico del director de la escuela de su hijo compartiendo la carta del Comisionado de Educacin de Massachusetts, Jeff Riley a los padres sobre cmo funcionarn las escuelas durante la crisis de Covid-19. La carta explica las recomendaciones de aprendizaje remoto del Departamento de Educacin, as como ltimas noticias sobre una variedad de otros asuntos relacionados con el cierre de escuelas. Entiendo que este es un momento desafiante para usted y su familia y queremos mantener a su hijo comprometido para su regreso eventual a la escuela, actualmente programado para el 4 de mayo de 2020.

p.em: The mission of the Fitchburg Public Schools is to provide coordinated curricular and extracurricular experiences that inspire students to develop the academic, intellectual, creative, technological, and social skills necessary to work and to participate in our democratic society.

a.title: Open Presentation, Google Sites Slide Show
